options.content: SELECT count(*) as 'Total Actions' from Events

targets.queryText: SELECT count(*) as 'Total Actions' from Events

options.content:
SELECT 
        e.tags ->> '$.description' as 'Action Description', 
        e.tags ->> '$.state' as State,
        e.tags ->> '$.type' as Type, 
        e.tags ->> '$.severity' as Severity 
    FROM
        EVENTS as e

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
    e.tags ->> '$.description' as 'Action Description', 
    e.tags ->> '$.state' as State,
    e.tags ->> '$.type' as Type,
    e.tags ->> '$.severity' as Severity
FROM 
    EVENTS as e

options.content:
SELECT 
    from_unix_timestamp(start_time) as 'Time First Recommended', 
    from_unix_timestamp(end_time) as 'End Time', 
    tags ->> '$.type' as Type,
    tags ->> '$.state' as State,
    tags ->> '$.cost.delta' as 'Cost Delta (USD/hour)',
    tags ->> '$.description' as Description
from events 
    where tags ->> '$.cost.delta' IS NOT NULL
order by 'End Time' DESC

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
from_unix_timestamp(start_time) as 'Time First Recommended', 
from_unix_timestamp(end_time) as 'End Time', 
tags ->> '$.type' as Type,
tags ->> '$.state' as State,
tags ->> '$.cost.delta' as 'Cost Delta (USD/hour)',
tags ->> '$.description' as Description
from events 
where tags ->> '$.cost.delta' IS NOT NULL
order by 'End Time' DESC

options.content:
SELECT
    count(*) as 'Total Actions',
    e.tags ->> '$.type' as Type
FROM 
    EVENTS as e
GROUP BY Type

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
    e.tags ->> '$.type' as Type,
    count(*) as 'Total Actions'
FROM 
    EVENTS as e
GROUP BY Type

options.content:
SELECT

    count(*) as 'Total Actions'
FROM
    EVENTS as e
GROUP BY Category

options.content:
SELECT
    count(*) as 'onPrem Actions'   
from 
    events as e  
where
    e.tags ->> '$.cost.delta' is null

targets.queryText:
SELECT
    count(*) as 'onPrem Actions'
from 
    events as e
where
    e.tags ->> '$.cost.delta' is null

options.content:
SELECT
    count(*) as 'Cloud Actions'  
from 
    events as e 
where
    e.tags ->> '$.cost.delta' is not null

targets.queryText:
SELECT
   count(*) as 'Cloud Actions'
from 
    events as e
where
    e.tags ->> '$.cost.delta' is not null

options.content:
SELECT
  relabel(
    ts_sum(
      ts_reduce_max(ts_mask(to_timerange(e.start_time, e.end_time)),'1h')
    ),
        e.tags ->> '$.category'
    )
from 
    events as e
Group By e.tags ->> '$.category'

panels.title: Total Actions over time by category

targets.queryText:

    ),

    )
from 
    events as e
Group By e.tags ->> '$.category'

options.content:
SELECT
  e.tags ->> '$.description' as Description,
  json_extract(e.tags,'$.commodity_deltas') as 'Commodity Deltas'
from 
    events as e

targets.queryText:
SELECT
  e.tags ->> '$.description' as Description,
  json_extract(e.tags,'$.commodity_deltas') as 'Commodity Deltas'
from 
    events as e
where 
   json_extract(e.tags,'$.commodity_deltas') is not null
    and e.tags ->> '$.type' = 'Resize'

options.content:
SELECT
  e.tags ->> '$.description' as Description,
  json_extract(e.tags,'$.triggering_commodities') as 'Triggering Commodities'
from 
    events as e

targets.queryText:
SELECT
  e.tags ->> '$.description' as Description,
  json_extract(e.tags,'$.triggering_commodities') as 'Triggering Commodities'
from 
    events as e

options.content:
SELECT
  relabel(
    ts_accum(
      ts_reduce_area(
        ts_sum(
        ts_reduce_avg(
        ts_mask(
          to_timerange(
            e.end_time, 
            ${__to:date:seconds}
          )) * -1 * cast(e.tags ->> '$.cost.delta' as decimal) / 3600, '1h')), '24h')),
    e.tags ->> '$.type'
  )
FROM
  events as e  
WHERE
  e.tags ->> '$.cost.delta' is not null     
Group by e.tags ->> '$.type'

targets.queryText:
SELECT
  relabel(
    ts_accum(
      ts_reduce_area(
        ts_sum(
        ts_reduce_avg(
        ts_mask(
          to_timerange(
            e.end_time, 
            ${__to:date:seconds}
          )) * -1 * cast(e.tags ->> '$.cost.delta' as decimal) / 3600, '1h'))
          , '24h'))
        ,
    e.tags ->> '$.type'
  )
FROM
  events as e  
WHERE
  e.tags ->> '$.cost.delta' is not null     
Group by e.tags ->> '$.type'
